job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>TITLE: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer</p><p>LOCATION: Remote</p><p>Duration: 8 months+ extensions</p><p><br></p><p><strong> ***********Must be eligible to work on W2****************</strong></p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;Ideal Qualifications:</p><ul><li>5+ Python software development for composition and modularity, debugging and following tracebacks</li><li>Strong stats background and concepts including hypothesis testing, correlation, R squared, P-value</li><li>Experience with Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Pytorch</li><li>Tensorflow functional API, deep learning</li><li>Mathematics of machine learning- linear algebra, multivariable calculus</li><li>SQL querying</li><li>Hyperparameter optimization, regularizing regression models</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Nice to Have</strong></p><ul><li>Masters HIGHLY preferred!!</li><li>Ecommerce experience</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities include:</strong></p><ul><li>Analyze large data sets by quantifying the data quality, identifying particular patterns, and visualizing results</li><li>Understand business problems and identify the right data sets and ML/Statistical approach to produce the desired outcomes</li><li>Adapt to account for changes and be able to propose alternative approaches</li><li>Ideate and develop analytics and modeling solutions cross-functionally to build customized, long-term, and sustainable solutions</li><li>Provide critical thought leadership and enhance organizational capabilities</li><li>Own machine learning pipelines end-to-end</li><li>Write production-grade machine learning code using standard engineering practices and deploy models to production</li><li>Improve codebase and lead/participate in code reviews with Research Scientists and Data Scientists</li><li>Help non-engineers develop their engineering skills</li><li>Mentor junior team members and contribute to a culture where everyone is valued</li></ul><p><br></p>
